title: Beginning Node.js, Express & MongoDB Development
review: Short, sweet, and loaded with working examples.

title: Pat the Bunny
review: Who doesn't like patting bunnies?  Story was too complex, though.

title: The Hobbit
review: I read this at least 20 time growing up.

title: The Design of Everyday Things
review: Excellent treatise on why things around us are designed the way they are.  Great for people working on UX/UI design.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
review: Bite-sized essays on different aspects of software development.

title: What You Are Getting Wrong About Appalachia
review: Recommended to me; on my reading list!

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
review: Recommended to me; on my reading list.  Big book.

title: The React Workshop
authors: Brandon Richey, Ryan Yu, Endre Vegh
review: Typos and errors in the very first exercises.  Do not recommend.
